bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang ti 羊蹄 quoting Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 : 治漏瘤瘡，濕癬癢 , 浸淫日廣，癢不可忍 , “It cures leaking tumor sores, and moisture xuan -illness with itching. The immersion widens day by day. The itching is unbearable”, writes: 漏瘤濕癬，浸淫日廣，癢不可忍 , “ Leaking tumors with moisture xuan-illness. The immersion widens day by day. The itching is unbearable”.
